metadata.title: CVE-2016-4074 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The jv_dump_term function in jq 1.5 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack consumption and application crash) via a craftedJSON file. This issue has been fixed in jq 1.6_rc1-r0.

criterions.comment: jq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
